summary: The module showcases a sample application that configures an LLM (OpenAI or Replicate) with a customizable prompt template, offers helper utilities to request text completions, and ties the workflow into the Agenta experimentation framework.
business_intent: To give developers a ready‑to‑run example for quickly prototyping and testing language model prompts and provider choices within Agenta, enabling rapid experimentation and evaluation of LLM outputs.
